meta.philosophy: Learning without trauma. Growth through joy. Skills through lived experience.
meta.approach: Micro-lessons embedded in daily app use. No grades, no pressure, no classroom vibes.

learningPathways.name: Creative Expression Mastery
learningPathways.resumeValue: Digital Media Production, Visual Arts, Creative Direction

modules.name: Photography & Composition
passiveTriggers: When viewing photos in ancestor gallery: Tooltip shows composition analysis
When uploading selfies: AI suggests framing improvements
Daily photo challenge based on current mood/aesthetic
When planning outfits: Learn color psychology and cultural symbolism
While listening to music: Study genre history and cultural movements
modules.learningStyle: Show, don't tell. Context over lectures.
modules.realWorldApplication: Build photography portfolio for modeling work, document activism, create visual narratives

modules.name: UI/UX & Digital Design
passiveTriggers: When customizing app themes: Learn design principles in tooltips
When organizing spaces: Apply visual hierarchy concepts
Earn badges for creating accessible, beautiful interfaces
Get design critique on your theme choices (gentle, encouraging)
modules.progressTracking: Theme portfolio, UI mockups you've created
modules.realWorldApplication: Build resume with 'Created 94+ accessible UI themes', design portfolio pieces

modules.name: Drawing, Painting & Mixed Media
passiveTriggers: Daily drawing prompt based on mood/spoons
Ancestor altar art prompts (draw protective symbols, family portraits)
Fashion sketch feature when outfit planning
modules.progressTracking: Art journal, portfolio exports, social media ready pieces
modules.realWorldApplication: Sellable art, Etsy shop potential, commission work, therapeutic practice

learningPathways.name: Language Learning Through Media
learningPathways.resumeValue: Multilingual Communication, Cultural Competency, Translation Skills

modules.name: Japanese via Anime & Manga
passiveTriggers: Subtitle mode in anime tracker: Learn phrases while watching
Daily vocabulary from currently watching shows
Manga reading mode with furigana tooltips
Cultural notes on rituals, food, traditions shown in media
modules.progressTracking: Vocabulary flashcards auto-generated from your watchlist
modules.realWorldApplication: Travel prep, subtitler/translator work, convention navigation, deeper media appreciation

modules.name: Korean via K-Dramas
passiveTriggers: Auto-generated study decks from your favorite shows
modules.realWorldApplication: K-beauty industry knowledge, travel readiness, fan translation work

modules.name: Spanish via Music & Community
passiveTriggers: Song lyrics translation in music player
Activism resources in Spanish with translation notes
Family history research includes Spanish naming patterns
modules.realWorldApplication: Community organizing, family connections, healthcare navigation, workplace communication

learningPathways.name: Tech Skills & Automation
learningPathways.resumeValue: Systems Administration, Automation Engineering, Data Management, No-Code/Low-Code Development

modules.name: JSON & Data Structures
passiveTriggers: When viewing app data: See JSON structure with explanations
Creating custom themes teaches JSON editing
Feature requests teach data structure thinking
modules.progressTracking: Custom datasets created, API understanding level
modules.realWorldApplication: Resume: 'Experience with JSON APIs, data modeling, system architecture'

modules.name: Automation & Workflows
passiveTriggers: When scheduling tasks: Learn automation concepts
Suggested automations based on behavior patterns
modules.realWorldApplication: Resume: 'Designed and implemented automated workflows', consulting potential

modules.name: App Development Fundamentals
passiveTriggers: Feature idea submission teaches requirements thinking
Using cross-platform features teaches platform differences
modules.progressTracking: Feature ideas documented, design portfolio pieces
modules.realWorldApplication: Resume: 'Product design experience', portfolio of app concepts

modules.name: Poetry & Spoken Word

Journal entries can become poems with AI suggestions (opt-in)

modules.name: Narrative & Creative Fiction
passiveTriggers: D&D campaign notes teach storytelling structure
Character profile creation (for roleplay or fiction)
modules.realWorldApplication: Published fiction, game writing, screenplay adaptation, content creation

modules.name: Advocacy & Persuasive Writing
modules.progressTracking: Published articles, social media impact, letters written
modules.realWorldApplication: Resume: 'Community advocacy', 'Published writer', 'Organizer', grant writing

passiveTriggers: Fashion history notes on styles you choose

gamificationWithoutTriggers.philosophy: NO grades, NO tests, NO deadlines. Growth is documented, not judged.

progressIndicators.portfolioPieces: Collection of work created, not points earned
progressIndicators.resumeBuilder: Auto-generates resume bullets from real work done
progressIndicators.transcriptGenerator: Creates unofficial transcript showing equivalent coursework

gamificationWithoutTriggers.celebrationStyle: Gentle affirmations, not pressure. 'You made something beautiful today' not 'You're behind schedule'
gamificationWithoutTriggers.optOut: Every learning feature can be hidden. Privacy always.
gamificationWithoutTriggers.noComparison: Your journey only. No leaderboards, no competition.

experience.title: Product Designer & Developer
achievements: Designed and implemented 94+ accessible UI themes following WCAG AA standards
Created comprehensive data architecture using JSON for life management system
Developed automation workflows for health tracking and personal management
Built cross-platform application (desktop, web, mobile) with offline-first capabilities

experience.title: Creative Professional
achievements: Photography portfolio spanning editorial, portrait, and documentary work
Published poet with focus on intersectional identity and activism
Multimedia content creator across visual art, writing, and performance
Genealogical researcher preserving family history and ancestral knowledge

experience.title: Community Organizer & Advocate
achievements: Developed trauma-informed communication frameworks for community organizing
Created accessibility resources and self-advocacy tools
Facilitated workshops on intersectionality and cultural competency
Published writing on disability rights, queer liberation, and racial justice

certifications: Trauma-Informed Care Practitioner (Lived experience + structured learning)

howToUseLearningForCredit: Portfolio Assessment: Many colleges accept life experience portfolios for credit
CLEP/DSST Testing: Free study through app, pay only if you want official credit ($89/test)
PLA (Prior Learning Assessment): Document skills gained for institutional credit
Competency-Based Programs: WGU, Excelsior, etc. accept demonstrated skills
Credit by Examination: Challenge courses at community colleges
Apprenticeships & Industry Certs: Trade schools accept demonstrated competency
noTuitionRequired: Document your learning journey in the app
Use auto-generated transcripts for preliminary review
Only pay if you decide to pursue official credit
Many community colleges offer free PLA consultations

antiAcademicTraumaFeatures.noDeadlines: Learn at your own pace, always
antiAcademicTraumaFeatures.noFailure: Every attempt is data, not judgment
antiAcademicTraumaFeatures.noPressure: You can hide any learning feature anytime
antiAcademicTraumaFeatures.noQuizzes: Understanding shown through creation, not testing
antiAcademicTraumaFeatures.noAttendance: No one tracking if you engage today

dailyExamples: Morning: Medication tracking teaches pharmacology basics
Breakfast: Sodium logging teaches nutrition science
Commute: Music playlist teaches genre history and cultural movements
Afternoon: Outfit planning teaches design principles and cultural semiotics
Evening: Watching K-drama teaches Korean language passively
Night: Journaling teaches narrative structure and self-reflection
Anytime: Using the app IS learning systems design, data management, and accessibility
realWorldOutputs: Portfolio website auto-generated from your work
Resume bullets auto-written from features you use
Etsy/Gumroad products from templates you've created
Teaching materials from your own learning journey
